description: Describes the settings for the event selectors that you configured for your trail. The information returned for your event selectors includes the following: For more information about logging management, data, and network activity events, see the following topics in the CloudTrail User Guide:

nested_items.name: TrailARN
nested_items.description: The specified trail ARN that has the event selectors.

nested_items.name: EventSelectors
nested_items.description: The event selectors that are configured for the trail.

nested_items.name: ReadWriteType
nested_items.description: Specify if you want your trail to log read-only events, write-only events, or all. For example, the EC2 GetConsoleOutput is a read-only API operation and RunInstances is a write-only API operation.

nested_items.name: IncludeManagementEvents
nested_items.description: Specify if you want your event selector to include management events for your trail.

nested_items.name: DataResources
nested_items.description: CloudTrail supports data event logging for Amazon S3 objects in standard S3 buckets, Lambda functions, and Amazon DynamoDB tables with basic event selectors. You can specify up to 250 resources for an individual event selector, but the total number of data resources cannot exceed 250 across all event selectors in a trail. This limit does not apply if you configure resource logging for all data events.
AWS::DynamoDB::Table.
AWS::Lambda::Function.
AWS::S3::Object.

nested_items.name: ExcludeManagementEventSources
nested_items.description: An optional list of service event sources from which you do not want management events to be logged on your trail. In this release, the list can be empty (disables the filter), or it can filter out Key Management Service or Amazon RDS Data API events by containing kms.amazonaws.com or rdsdata.amazonaws.com. By default, ExcludeManagementEventSources is empty, and KMS and Amazon RDS Data API events are logged to your trail. You can exclude management event sources only in Regions that support the event source.
(string) ---

nested_items.name: AdvancedEventSelectors
nested_items.description: The advanced event selectors that are configured for the trail.

nested_items.name: Name
nested_items.description: An optional, descriptive name for an advanced event selector, such as 'Log data events for only two S3 buckets'.

nested_items.name: FieldSelectors
nested_items.description: Contains all selector statements in an advanced event selector.

nested_items.name: Field
nested_items.description: A field in a CloudTrail event record on which to filter events to be logged. For event data stores for CloudTrail Insights events, Config configuration items, Audit Manager evidence, or events outside of Amazon Web Services, the field is used only for selecting events as filtering is not supported.

nested_items.name: Equals
nested_items.description: An operator that includes events that match the exact value of the event record field specified as the value of Field. This is the only valid operator that you can use with the readOnly, eventCategory, and resources.type fields.
(string) ---

nested_items.name: StartsWith
nested_items.description: An operator that includes events that match the first few characters of the event record field specified as the value of Field.
(string) ---

nested_items.name: EndsWith
nested_items.description: An operator that includes events that match the last few characters of the event record field specified as the value of Field.
(string) ---

nested_items.name: NotEquals
nested_items.description: An operator that excludes events that match the exact value of the event record field specified as the value of Field.
(string) ---

nested_items.name: NotStartsWith
nested_items.description: An operator that excludes events that match the first few characters of the event record field specified as the value of Field.
(string) ---

nested_items.name: NotEndsWith
nested_items.description: An operator that excludes events that match the last few characters of the event record field specified as the value of Field.
(string) ---
